dc_title_s: The Geffrard map of the island of Hayti : drawn for James Redpath's guide to Hayti
dc_description_s: Covers entire island of Hispaniola, showing relief, railways, cities and towns; administrative regions of Haiti in differing colors.; Relief shown by hachures.; "Engraved & printed by G. Woolworth Colton."; "Entered ... by James Redpath in the Clerks Office of the District Court ..."|34 x 58 centimeters, on sheet 46 x 70 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:1,180,000|General Map Collection
